metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8905 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
do_core_note in readelf.c in libmagic.a in file 5.35 has a stack-basedbuffer over-read, related to file_printable, a different vulnerability thanCVE-2018-10360.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8905` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

file - 1:5.25-2ubuntu1.2
libmagic1 - 1:5.25-2ubuntu1.2
python-magic - 1:5.25-2ubuntu1.2
python3-magic - 1:5.25-2ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: file package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:5.25-2ubuntu1.2').
